name: Gent Set Radio
description:
Gent(rification) Set Radio

a gang of hot brown kids get their kicks by parkouring all over Toronto's overpriced condo skyline

  • prototype made during DMG's Gym Jam, everything else finished a month later or so
  • originally there was going to be a convoluted MakeyMakey jump pad controller thing for four people but the logistics of conductive material/skin/potentially having to wipe down surfaces that came in contact with random human feet bothered me a bit
  • I have yet to remove the bug that makes you stick to the sides of buildings
  • music composed by Robby Duguay!
  • Toronto skyline image taken from here: http://www.bielousov.com/2011/toronto-skyline/
